## üõ†Ô∏è TruAnon Private MCP Server ‚úÖ 2 operations

### About
The TruAnon API requires two arguments for all endpoints: your TruAnon Service Identifier (typically your root domain) and a unique Member Name. No setup or dependencies are needed‚Äîjust include your Private Token in requests. Data is continuously updated, so caching responses is unnecessary.

### üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the TruAnon Private API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://staging.truanon.com
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent


### üìã Available Operations (2 endpoints)

**Get Profile (1 operations)**
Fetch User Profile

**Request Token (1 operations)**
